ValidationRule.description: Validates that the account Physical Zip/Postal Code is in the correct format if Physical Country is Canada.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && AND( OR(ShippingCountry = "CAN", ShippingCountry = "CA", ShippingCountry = "Canada"), NOT(REGEX( ShippingPostalCode , "((?i)[ABCEGHJKLMNPRSTVXY]\\d[A-Z]?\\s?\\d[A-Z]\\d)?")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Canadian postal code must be in A9A 9A9 format.
